Articles.Content:
Hi Guys, 

Long time listener, first time caller, as it were... Steam tells me that I have 1100+ hours in this game. I'm sure that an inordinate amount of that time was spent in the VAB, tweaking a detail, walking way to do chores, arguing with myself, unchanging the same detail... then sending Kerbals off to a fiery doom.

I trust in the truth that is [F5] and [F9], and do not bother myself with the heretical practice of 'the maths'. As long as I'm confessing sins, I also abuse the Mechjeb. 

Thank you already for all of the ideas I've already poached off of you, and thank you in advance for the questions you are about to answer.

Scotty
Hi,welcome to the forumes. Hope you will do great around here!
